Your Investment for Visibility

Choose the right 2-Day Exhibition package to maximize your impact. All packages include a standard shell scheme (walls, fascia board, light).

Standard Booth

Ideal for: Local SMEs, First-time Exhibitors

₦25,000 / 2-Day Exhibition

Booth Size: 3m x 3m

The essential package to establish your presence and generate leads.

  • Dedicated 3m x 3m Exhibition Space
  • 1 Table and 2 Chairs Provided
  • Power Supply Access (Standard Load)
  • 2 Exhibitor Passes for Staff
  • Listing in Official Event Directory
